description.description: A longer description of the token and it's utility. Designed for tooltips or such

logo.description: A link to the logo, or a comment there is an on-chain logo stored

marketing.description: The address (if any) who can update this data structure

project.description: A URL pointing to the project behind this token. PLEASE REVIEW: is this dangerous from a security point of view?

LogoInfo.description: This is used to display logo info, provide a link or inform there is one that can be downloaded from the blockchain itself

anyOf.description: A reference to an externally hosted logo. Must be a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL.
